title: Banana
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=banana |cost=15 |weight=2 }} {{flavour|A delicious yellow fruit, probably grown and imported by some amoral multinational as the result of a corrupt trade deal.}} A '''banana''' is a fruit which normally provides 1,000 [[nutrition]]. '''Carnivore'''
Rank 1: 700.
Rank 2: 400.
Rank 3: 0. '''Herbivore'''
Rank 1: 1,300.
Rank 2. 1,600.
Rank 3. 1,900. ==History== In [[0.15]], all fruits and vegetables were condensed into the universal "[[fruit]]" item.
